text: Wohi hai jiss ney aasmanon aur zamin ko cheh (6) din mein peda kiya phir arsh per mustawi hogaya Woh (Khoob) jaanta hai uss cheez ko zamin mein jaye aur jo uss say niklay aur jo aasmanoon say neechay aaye. aur jo kuch Charh ker uss mein jaye aur jahan kahin tum ho woh tumharay sath hai aur jo tum kerahey ho Allah dekh raha hai
